name: part_000
file: tmp_≪-KAGURA- Dance of the Gods 3D LIVE≫ Hakos Baelz Birthday 2025 + ANNOUNCEMENTS! #BaeDDay2025 [viPlIHvk724]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Stream standby screen featuring Hakos Baelz in traditional Japanese attire with the title 'KAGURA Dance of the Gods'.
Animated stream intro sequence with upbeat background music.
The 3D stage is revealed: a traditional Japanese Kagura-den stage surrounded by a large arena. Dancers in black outfits and masks take their positions as Hakos Baelz arrives.
Hakos Baelz performs her original song 'Hyururira Boppa'.

subtitles.original: はららはらり　今　踊り踊れ
subtitles.english: Halarahalarai, now dance, dance

subtitles.original: 恋焦がれ遊べ　桜打て歌え
subtitles.english: Play with yearning, strike the cherry blossoms and sing

subtitles.original: 花に舞い散れ　今　戻り戻せ
subtitles.english: Scatter like flowers, now return, return

subtitles.original: 酔狂に遊べさぁ　此処で踊れ
subtitles.english: Play in madness, come, dance here

subtitles.original: さぁ此処で踊れ！
subtitles.english: Come, dance here!

subtitles.original:
ひゆるりらぼっぱ

Hyururira Boppa
Lyrics, Music: ruki

subtitles.original: 日進月歩　八百万時が過ぎゆく
subtitles.english: Day by day, eight million moments pass by

subtitles.original: 色取り取り様々連林囃子
subtitles.english: Many colors, various forest rhythms

subtitles.original: あんな事も　籠掘り込み
subtitles.english: Throwing even those things into the basket

subtitles.original: 欲にまみれ生きていたい
subtitles.english: I want to live covered in desires

subtitles.original: 人生寄り道　回り道
subtitles.english: Life is a detour, a roundabout way

subtitles.original: 生きたいように生きなはれや
subtitles.english: Live exactly as you want to
